data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pompozzi, Gabriel (2015): A new species of Losdolobus Platnick & Brescovit 1994 (Araneae: Orsolobidae) from Argentina with notes on its ecology and distribution. Zootaxa 3990 (3): 419-428, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3990.3.6
